segments.text: I swear I will never shop at a street market in China . It's a terrible place full of excellent profiteers ! You have to keep an eye whenever it comes to paying for something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: cool down , Harry ! What are you really mad about ? Did you get ripped off ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes . Last Sunday I went to a nearby market . It was on open-air fair . I chanced upon this bag and bought it on the spot , without even trying to strike a bargain . I paid one hundred and twenty . And just
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: is that so ? I'm afraid people here will not take pity on unlucky guys like you . Bargaining has always been an indispensable procedure in business deals . It's the norm of free trade . The seller sets
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: but don't you think it annoying to overcharge the customers by such a handsome margin ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: of course , that's something really irritation . And the only way to avoid being trapped is to know in advance about the real worth of the stuff . I recommend you to consult the price tags in the superb
segments.speaker: S2
